publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R
S1M-330 Openness in Scottish Football (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-330 Openness in Scottish Football (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-330 Openness in Scottish Football (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-330 Openness in Scottish Football (lodged on 26 November 1999) Phil Gallie*

S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie
S1M-330 Openness in Scottish Football (lodged on 26 November 1999) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie, Tommy Sheridan

S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie, Tommy Sheridan

S1M-330 Mr Brian Monteith: Openness in Scottish Football—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Premier League and the Scottish Football Association to arrange for all four match officials to give post match press conferences in order that they may explain decisions made during the course of games. R Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie, Tommy Sheridan
